metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5428 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2019-11358.Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2019-11358. Notes: All CVEusers should reference CVE-2019-11358 instead of this candidate. Allreferences and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to preventaccidental usage.

criterions.comment: jquery: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
